Gbgs Soc-kerbr. fr. 44. Led. av Sv. tekn :fören., Tekn. samf. i Gbg.
translated: Åkermark, Bertil Gudmund Harald, civil engineer, Gothenburg, b. 22/1/18 in Stockholm to Vice Admiral C. H. Ä. and Märtha Gj^erHng. Married in 1946 to Margaretha Fromeli. — Completed studies in 1936, graduated from the Royal Institute of Technology in 1940. Studied in Germany, Switzerland, Italy in 1939, and England in 1946. Employed by the Navy's shale oil plant from 1940-1944, chemist at Swedish Sugar Factory AB in Säbyholm from 1942, operating engineer in Staffanstorp in 1943, assistant manager at Gothenburg's Sugar Brewery from 1944. Member of the Swedish Technical Association, Technical Society in Gothenburg.

structured.name: Bertil Gudmund Harald Åkermark
structured.description: Bertil Gudmund Harald Åkermark was a civil engineer born in Stockholm on January 22, 1918.
